talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Even though it seems like you don't have to touch it, if you intentionally include a similar description, I'm starting to wonder if there's some kind of purpose behind it!

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter:
I think both of us are tired of being in the military and want to go back to being free and not being bound by the big framework of the past.

I think that when taking that action, there is a difference in thinking depending on whether you respect the individual or respect the whole.

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Eddie also has a strong sense of belonging to the Band of the Dawn, and because he probably spent his childhood interacting with others even in the slums, I think he has a mindset of respecting everything, ``everyone!'' .

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Since Saza met Micaiah when she was a child, she has lived without interacting with others, so she does not place importance on living in a circle of people. So I thought all I needed was Micaiah.

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Sorry, this is so long and I don't know if it's a proper answer... Also, I used translation, but I'm sorry if it's difficult to understand ğŸ˜­
